name: Microexpression Interpretation
description: Training in the detection and analysis of involuntary facial expressions to assess emotions, deception, and intent.

cards.title: Introduction to Microexpressions
cards.description: Understanding the basics of microexpressions and their role in human communication.
bulletpoints: Defining microexpressions and their involuntary nature.
Understanding how emotions manifest in split-second facial cues.
Learning the difference between macroexpressions and microexpressions.
cards.summaryText: Grasp the involuntary flashes that separate microexpressions from longer macro tells.

cards.title: Identifying Universal Emotions
cards.description: Recognizing the seven universal emotions and their facial indicators.
bulletpoints: Happiness: Identifying genuine versus fake smiles.
Sadness: Detecting subtle drooping of facial features.
Anger: Recognizing narrowed eyes and tightened lips.
Surprise: Spotting raised eyebrows and widened eyes.
Fear: Observing tensed eyelids and open mouth.
Disgust: Noting wrinkled noses and raised upper lips.
Contempt: Recognizing asymmetric smirks.
cards.summaryText: Drill each universal emotionâ€™s micro signature so you can spot authentic flashes instantly.

cards.title: Distinguishing Genuine and Fake Emotions
cards.description: Analyzing differences between authentic and fabricated emotional expressions.
bulletpoints: Identifying Duchenne smiles and authentic happiness.
Detecting insincere sadness and crocodile tears.
Spotting masked anger through subtle muscular tension.
cards.summaryText: Compare muscle activation to split genuine joy from crafted displays and hidden anger.

cards.title: Microexpression Recognition in Real-Time
cards.description: Developing the ability to detect microexpressions during conversations.
bulletpoints: Training peripheral vision to catch rapid emotional shifts.
Practicing with video analysis and real-time observation.
Utilizing subconscious awareness to improve detection speed.
cards.summaryText: Train eyes and intuition to capture fleeting cues live instead of on replay.

cards.title: Microexpressions and Lie Detection
cards.description: Using facial analysis to detect deception and hidden intent.
bulletpoints: Recognizing hesitation or masking of true emotions.
Identifying conflicting facial expressions and verbal statements.
Understanding involuntary emotional leaks under stress.
cards.summaryText: Watch for leaks, mismatched faces, and stress bursts that betray concealed truth.

cards.title: Baseline Emotional Calibration
cards.description: Establishing an emotional baseline for accurate deception detection.
bulletpoints: Determining a person's natural resting expressions.
Comparing normal expressions with stressed or manipulated responses.
Using context to differentiate between genuine and deceptive signals.
cards.summaryText: Document baseline expressions so deviations under pressure stand out clearly.

cards.title: Contextual Analysis of Microexpressions
cards.description: Interpreting microexpressions in different social and cultural settings.
bulletpoints: Recognizing cultural differences in emotional display.
Understanding how stress and social norms affect expressions.
Analyzing microexpressions in high-stakes environments.
cards.summaryText: Factor culture, stressors, and stakes so readings stay accurate across contexts.

cards.title: Microexpression Clusters and Patterns
cards.description: Learning to identify clusters of microexpressions to assess intent.
bulletpoints: Observing multiple expressions in sequence for deeper insight.
Understanding microexpression layering in deception scenarios.
Cross-referencing facial expressions with verbal and body language cues.
cards.summaryText: Read expression clusters over time and cross-check with words and posture for intent clarity.

cards.title: Developing a Psychological Advantage
cards.description: Using microexpression analysis to gain an edge in negotiations and interactions.
bulletpoints: Adjusting communication style based on real-time facial cues.
Detecting resistance or compliance before words are spoken.
Influencing outcomes by mirroring and adapting to emotional states.
cards.summaryText: Adapt strategy mid-conversation as micro cues reveal resistance, compliance, or openings.

cards.title: Advanced Tactical Microexpression Analysis

bulletpoints: Using microexpressions in interrogations and interviews.
